value:
$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Where are you, Oscar? I have to find
you. I need you to cook for me...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|I keep telling you, he's not—whoa,
hey! Who are you guys?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|So many potential rivals, so little time!
Who's up first?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Look at him, Ike. He really seems like
he wants to say something, but...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アイク|But maybe he can't. I think you might
be right about that.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_比翼アイク,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Looks like we finally understand each
other. You want to talk to us, but
you can't.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|Mmm!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Ohhh, so that's why he's so quiet.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|Uh... Uh-huh.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Yeah, he's trying to talk to us, that's
for sure...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アイク,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|And even if we can't understand him,
it seems like he understands us
just fine.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|Uh-huh.$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Well, there's only one thing left to do.
If he doesn't know how to speak,
we'll just have to teach him!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ボーレ,ch09_27_Bole_M_Before01,Face|Great idea! I've got a little brother
who's just starting to talk, so this'll
be great experience for me.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|All we have to do is give him a strong
example to follow. So let's be
a bunch of blabbermouths!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アイク,ch09_00_Ike_MF_Pair,Face|Hey, take it easy. You know by now
we're not looking to hurt you, right?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Before01,Face|...$k$pR... R... Right.$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|
